ygData.subject: Dunfire Toungues
ygData.msgSnippet: Quest is a rogue-type quest. Jeet(?) or one of the rogue dwarves that hang out by the bank in kaladim will give you the quest(may be Mater). Anyway you turn in
ygData.messageBody:
Quest is a rogue-type quest. Jeet(?) or one of the rogue dwarves that hang
out by the bank in kaladim will give you the quest(may be Mater). Anyway
you turn in 4(four) dunfire tougues which are found, two in the bandit camp
by orcs in BB, one in bandit camp by goblin warrior camp and one off Rondo
Dunfire, found in the the slaver area of CrushBone. Dont know what to do
with Peg's Leg hehe, have been carrying that one around too.

Best to ye

Kili, 19th Dwarf Warrior
Veeshan
